tool_description:
AnswerChatAI is a ChatGPT (GPT-3.5) powered question answering app - a powerful tool for anyone who needs to extract information from custom documents quickly and accurately. Its advanced natural language processing algorithms and user-friendly interface make it an ideal solution for students, researchers, business professionals, and anyone else who needs to find answers to complex questions within their documents.

AnswerChatAI has a unique feature that allows it to find "needles in informat...
name: ChatGPT Powered Question Answering Over Documents
title: ChatGPT Powered Question Answering Over Documents
tool_name: ChatGPT Powered Question Answering Over Documents

api_list.name: Document Querying
api_list.description:
Input a Query and Document in json format like the example below and get your answer! 

{"text": text, "query": "What is this document about?"}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-powered-question-answering-over-documents.p.rapidapi.com/qa877"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-powered-question-answering-over-documents.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-powered-question-answering-over-documents.p.rapidapi.com/qa877"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-powered-question-answering-over-documents.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
